_header: God that is worthy and bold
Note:
Ringler Jr. (1988)
XRingler Jr., William A. Bibliography and Index of English Verse Printed 1476-1558. London: Mansell, 1988, TP 504.3.
_description: Sir Torrent of Portyngale — 2668 lines in 12-line stanzas

Chetham8009.First Lines:
God that ys worthy and Boldheuen and Erthe haue In
                    hold…
Chetham8009.Last Lines:
…he graunt vs in blis to beOute of this world whan we shall
                    wend Amen
Chetham8009.Editions:
Halliwell-Phillipps,  James Orchard. 
             Torrent of Portugal: an English Metrical Romance.
         London: J.R. Smith, 1842. 
Adam,  E.,
                        ed.  
             Torrent of Portyngale
EETS
         e.s. 51 (1887), repr. 1973.
